steps.title: Click on "Steam" button on the left corner of your Steam client.
steps.content: Click on "Steam" button on the left corner of your Steam client.

steps.title: Find the item labeled "Beta participation", and a button "Change".
steps.content: Find the item labeled "Beta participation", and a button "Change". Click on it.

steps.title: Change the "Beta participation" to "Steam Beta Update".
steps.content: Change the "Beta participation" to "Steam Beta Update".

steps.title: Click on "Restart Steam" and you'll be good to go!
steps.content: Click on "Restart Steam" and you'll be good to go!
